name: Cat clicker (itch) (pugsforlifebruh12)
description:
Description

The most normal cat game in Ohio! Ohio residents will want to play this! It's a clicker game with 3 songs! Sigh of dog, Snowy, And Megalovania! all from undertale!

Features

RPG Mode - Defeat the cat's evil brother for cats! (You need 30+ cats to defeat)

Cat clicker - Gain cats by clicking the cat!

Shop - Pay with cats to get upgrades!
